intro.lead: Most of my client work is protected under NDA. This showroom lets you experience what's possible without revealing any private details.
intro.body: Each example demonstrates a real capability—web, automation, and AI—using fictional brands and placeholder content. If you'd like to see a tailored demo, I can spin up a private instance for your team.

privacy.title: Privacy Statement
privacy.quote: Every project I build is unique—and often private. This showroom features fictional or anonymized examples only. Actual client systems are developed under NDA, hosted securely, and never shared publicly.
